message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO 

This paper discusses deep learning architectures for image caption generation, which involves natural language processing (NLP) and computer vision (CV) tasks. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP. The second most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), which deals with CV. The paper also discusses the limitations of current deep learning architectures and suggests improvements, which falls under the scope of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the paper suggests modeling geometric relations between objects, which is related to robotics and control, falling under the scope of cs.RO (Robotics).
